summary.para: Determines whether OOBE (Windows Welcome) has been completed.

param.name: isOOBEComplete
param.para: Pointer to a variable that will receive the completion of OOBE upon success.

returns.para: TRUE if the OOBE completion state was successfully set. Otherwise, FALSE if OOBE completion state was not set. If FALSE, will retrieve extended error information.

summary.para: Registers a callback to be called once OOBE (Windows Welcome) has been completed.

param.name: OOBECompletedCallback
param.para: Pointer to an application-defined callback function that will be called upon completion of OOBE. For more information, see OOBE_COMPLETED_CALLBACK.

param.name: CallbackContext
param.para: Pointer to the callback context. This value will be passed to the function specified by OOBECompletedCallback. This value can be null.

param.name: WaitHandle
param.para: Pointer to a variable that will receive the handle to the wait callback registration.

returns.para: TRUE if the routine successfully registered the callback. Otherwise, FALSE is returned. If FALSE, will retrieve extended error information.

remarks.para: If RegisterWaitUntilOOBECompleted returns FALSE, and a subsequent call to returns a value of ERROR_INVALID_STATE, this indicates that OOBE is already complete and there is no need to register for OOBE completion.

summary.para: Unregisters the callback previously registered via RegisterWaitUntilOOBECompleted.

returns.para: TRUE if the callback was successfully unregistered. Otherwise, FALSE is returned. If FALSE, will retrieve extended error information.
